mapper.insert: insert into tbl_clue ( id, fullname, appellation, owner, company, job, email, phone, website, mphone, state, source, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address, createTime, createBy ) values ( #{id}, #{fullname}, #{appellation}, #{owner}, #{company}, #{job}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{website}, #{mphone}, #{state}, #{source}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{address}, #{createTime}, #{createBy} )
mapper.select: select c.id, c.fullname, c.appellation, u.name as owner, c.company, c.job, c.email, c.phone, c.website, c.mphone, c.state, c.source, c.description, c.contactSummary, c.nextContactTime, c.address, c.createTime, c.createBy, c.editTime, c.editBy from tbl_clue c , tbl_user u where c.id = #{id} and u.id = c.owner

SELECT a.id, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, u.name AS OWNER FROM tbl_activity a ,tbl_user u WHERE a.id NOT IN ( SELECT activityId FROM tbl_clue_activity_relation WHERE clueId = #{clueId} ) AND u.id = a.owner

SELECT a.id, a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, u.name AS OWNER FROM tbl_activity a ,tbl_user u WHERE a.id IN ( SELECT activityId FROM tbl_clue_activity_relation WHERE clueId = #{clueId} ) AND u.id = a.owner
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_clue_activity_relation ( id, clueId, activityId ) values ( #{id}, #{clueId}, #{activityId} )
